item.title: 土耳其反对党抨击央行干预动荡局势
item.description: 土耳其的主要反对党指责中央银行为政府提供掩护，帮助政府管理上周伊斯坦布尔市长被拘留事件的金融后果。【原文：Turkey’s main opposition party accused the central bank of providing cover for the government in helping to manage the financial fallout from last week’s detention of the mayor of Istanbul.】

item.title: 象牙海岸 17.5 亿美元欧洲债券吸引了两倍多的需求
item.description: 据一位熟悉该交易的人士称，象牙海岸 17.5 亿美元欧元债券的需求量超过了两倍，这对正在寻求更多资金的西非国家来说是个好消息。【原文：Demand for Ivory Coast’s $1.75 billion eurobond was more than double, according to a person familiar with the deal, in good news for the West African nation as it seeks more funding.】

item.title: 捷克再次停止降息，国防计划增加价格风险
item.description: 由于国内通胀风险持续存在，而全球贸易和地缘政治紧张局势又给经济前景蒙上了阴影，捷克决策者在过去三个月中第二次暂停了货币宽松政策。【原文：Czech policymakers paused monetary easing for the second time in the past three months as domestic inflation risks persist, while global trade and geopolitical tensions cloud the economic outlook.】

item.title: 核反应堆公司 Terrestrial Energy 将通过 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: 一家小型核反应堆开发商将通过一家特殊目的收购公司上市，该公司由前 Cantor Fitzgerald 首席执行官肖恩-马修斯（Shawn Matthews）领导。【原文：A developer of small nuclear reactors is going public via a special purpose acquisition company led by former Cantor Fitzgerald Chief Executive Officer Shawn Matthews.】

item.title: 肉类加工企业 JBS 称关税不会改变其在美国的增长计划
item.description: 全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS SA 表示，贸易关税不会改变公司在美国的发展计划。【原文：JBS SA, the world’s largest meatpacker, said trade tariffs aren’t changing the company’s growth plans in the US.】

item.title: 英国将在新债务计划中出售 2,990 亿英镑债券，减少长期吉尔债券数量
item.description: 英国正准备实施有史以来规模最大的债券销售计划之一，并计划向投资者提供债务管理办公室历史上比例最小的长期金边债券，从而使借贷更容易接受。【原文：The UK is readying one of its biggest bond sale programs on record and plans to make the borrowing more palatable by offering investors the smallest proportion of long-maturity gilts in the Debt Management Office’s history.】

item.title: 体育画报》将推出与竞技体育相关的投注市场
item.description: 体育画报》品牌正与英国媒体公司 Galactic 合作，推出一个预测市场，允许用户对与体育赛事有关的任何事情下注，但比赛结果除外。【原文：The Sports Illustrated brand is teaming up with UK-based media firm Galactic to launch a predictions market allowing users to bet on anything linked to athletic events — except the outcome of games.】

item.title: 帝国品牌推出五年期股票回购计划以提高回报率
item.description: 帝国品牌公司（Imperial Brands Plc）宣布了一项 "常青 "股票回购计划，以提高投资者回报，并计划削减成本。【原文：Imperial Brands Plc announced an “evergreen” share buyback program to boost investor returns as well as plans to cut costs, as the maker of Winston cigarettes said it expects to meet its full-year guidance.】

item.title: 米莱与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议在即，交易商押注阿根廷比索走弱
item.description: 投资者认为阿根廷比索即将再次贬值，在从 2023 年的全球最差货币之一变为去年表现最强劲的货币之一之后，阿根廷比索准备再次改变方向。【原文：Investors see the Argentine peso on the verge of devaluation again, with the currency poised to change direction once more after going from one of the worst in the world in 2023 to among the strongest performers last year.】

item.title: 代理权争夺战威胁后 Starboard 向 Autodesk 董事会提名三名董事
item.description: Starboard Value LP 提名了三名董事进入 Autodesk 公司董事会，在此之前，他们曾威胁要与 Autodesk 公司展开代理权争夺战长达近一年时间。【原文：Starboard Value LP nominated three directors to the Autodesk Inc. board after having threatened a proxy battle for nearly a year.】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席达布罗夫斯基认为 2025 年降息的可能性为 50/50
item.description: 政策制定者 Ireneusz Dabrowski 表示，由于价格稳定的风险挥之不去，波兰今年维持利率不变的可能性与降低借贷成本的可能性一样大。【原文：Poland is just as likely to keep interest rates unchanged this year due to lingering risks to price stability as it is to reduce borrowing costs, policymaker Ireneusz Dabrowski said.】

item.title: 壳牌和英国石油公司在清洁能源领域看到了贸易优势
item.description:
大型企业在成本高昂的过渡计划上有所退缩，但仍认为 "轻资本 "替代能源大有可为。【原文：

The majors retreated on costly transition plans yet still see promise in ‘capital-light’ alternative energy.

】

item.title: 美国商业设备订单四个月来首次下降
item.description: 2 月份，美国工厂的商业设备订单意外下降，这表明一些公司在等待关税和税收政策的具体细节时限制了投资。【原文：Orders placed with US factories for business equipment unexpectedly declined in February, suggesting some companies are limiting investment as they await specifics on tariffs and tax policy.】

item.title: 加拿大保守党计划为老年人提供更大的避税空间
item.description: 加拿大保守党正在提议为老年人提供广泛的税收减免，包括允许他们在避税退休账户中投资更长的时间，试图在国家大选中重新赢得优势。【原文：Canada’s Conservative Party is proposing a broad tax break for seniors, including allowing them to invest in tax-sheltered retirement accounts for longer, as it tries to regain the advantage in the country’s election.】

item.title: 瑞典将国防开支目标提高至 2030 年占国内生产总值的 3.5
item.description: 瑞典计划到 2030 年将军费开支提高到其经济产出的 3.5%，这明显超过了北约防务集团最新成员去年的目标。【原文：Sweden plans to lift its military spending to 3.5% of its economic output by 2030, clearly more than targeted last year by the newest member of the NATO defense bloc.】

item.title: 以色列中央银行行长批评内塔尼亚胡的预算案
item.description: 以色列中央银行行长批评了议会周二批准的政府预算，称该预算无法在 18 个月的战争导致债务激增后迅速降低债务。【原文：Israel’s central bank governor criticized the government’s budget, which was approved by parliament on Tuesday, saying it will fail to bring down debt quickly enough after a surge induced by 18 months of war.】

item.title: 德国商业银行前首席执行官克诺夫获数百万美元资助提前离职
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）几年前决定挖走曼弗雷德-克诺夫（Manfred Knof），使他成为该银行有史以来薪酬最高的首席执行官。该银行最近为让他提前离职所做的努力进一步提高了他的薪酬。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s decision a few years ago to poach Manfred Knof made him the lender’s best-paid chief executive officer ever. The lender’s more recent effort to get him to leave early boosted his pay further.】

item.title: 特朗普对中国的贸易攻势触及公海
item.description: 白宫推动遏制中国的海上主导地位并对关键航道施加更大影响的势头似乎正在增强。【原文：A White House push to curb China’s maritime dominance and exert more influence over critical shipping lanes looks to be gaining momentum.】

item.title: 关税 "解放日 "来临前债券市场吸引大量发行者
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划于 4 月 2 日征收全球关税之前，借款人纷纷涌入债券市场以完成交易。【原文：Borrowers are piling into bond markets to get deals done ahead of US President Donald Trump’s plans to impose global tariffs on April 2.】

item.title: 将工具制造商伊斯卡出售给巴菲特的史蒂夫-韦特海默逝世，享年 98 岁
item.description: 斯蒂夫-韦特海默（Stef Wertheimer）去世了，他是以色列工业家和共存倡导者，曾以 60 亿美元的价格将自己在破旧棚屋中创建的金属切削工具公司卖给了沃伦-巴菲特。享年 98 岁。【原文：Stef Wertheimer, an Israeli industrialist and coexistence advocate who sold the metal-cutting tool company that he founded in a rundown shack to Warren Buffett for $6 billion, has died. He was 98.】

item.title: 土耳其期待奇瑞签署价值 10 亿美元的电动汽车工厂协议
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其希望中国汽车制造商奇瑞汽车股份有限公司（Chery Automobile Co. Ltd.）投资约 10 亿美元建设一家电动汽车工厂，此举将增强安卡拉成为地区制造中心的雄心。【原文：Turkey expects Chinese carmaker Chery Automobile Co Ltd. to invest about $1 billion in an electric vehicle plant, a move that would bolster Ankara’s ambitions to become a regional manufacturing hub, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丹麦债券在集中发行后将提高流动性
item.description: 丹麦的 AAA 级政府债券市场将获得急需的流动性刺激，因为中央银行将接管这个北欧国家市政当局的融资。【原文：Denmark’s AAA rated government bond market is set to get a much-needed boost to liquidity as the central bank takes over financing for the Nordic country’s municipalities.】

item.title: 英国住房租金年增长率为 2023 年以来最慢
item.description: 据官方数据显示，英国住房租金的增长速度是自 2023 年以来最慢的，这给生活困难的租户带来了一些安慰。【原文：UK housing rents are growing at the slowest pace since 2023, according to official data, bringing some relief to hard-pressed tenants.】

item.title: 人工智能竞争白热化，SenseTime亏损超预期
item.description: 中国的 SenseTime 集团公司报告全年净亏损超过预期，这家人工智能工具开发商继续在拥挤的市场中努力应对日益激烈的竞争。【原文：China’s SenseTime Group Inc. reported a wider-than-estimated net loss for the full year as the AI tools developer continues to grapple with rising competition in a crowded market.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚在大选前第二次开拓国外市场
item.description: 在总统选举前的政治动荡中，罗马尼亚今年第二次发行国际债券，以帮助弥补预算赤字。【原文：Romania is offering international bonds for the second time this year to help finance its budget deficit amid political turmoil before the presidential election.】

item.title: 俄罗斯爆炸物生产商利用化肥企业抵御制裁
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的文件，俄罗斯计划从基本逃脱了国际制裁的化肥公司订购炸药制造所需的化学成分。【原文：Russia is scheduled to receive deliveries of chemical ingredients critical to the manufacture of explosives, ordered from fertilizer companies that have largely escaped international sanctions, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 亚马逊股价低于苹果和沃尔玛，吸引力与日俱增
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的股票开始看起来像便宜货，而这个词很少被用来形容这只股票。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. shares are starting to look like a bargain, a word that has rarely been used to describe the stock.】

item.title: 淘金热是美国巨额贸易赤字的根源
item.description: 我是文斯-高勒，驻华盛顿的编辑。今天我们将探讨黄金进口对美国货物贸易逆差的推动作用。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Vince Golle, an editor in Washington. Today we’re looking at gold imports driving the US goods-trade deficit. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 肯尼亚因收入低于目标而放弃平衡预算的梦想
item.description: 肯尼亚将不得不继续借贷来为预算提供资金，放弃了到 2027 年实现支出与税收相匹配的计划。【原文：Kenya will have to keep borrowing to fund its budget, dumping plans to match its spending with collected revenue by 2027.】

item.title: 德国初创企业因特朗普的科技 "热情 "而分裂的内幕
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Christina Kyriasoglou 在柏林揭示了德国初创企业界对唐纳德-特朗普的科技热情的激烈分歧。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou, in Berlin, unearths a bitter divide in Germany’s startup scene over Donald Trump’s tech enthusiasm.】
